ComicInfo.Summary:
"Dead Man's Hand," Part Three
Psychic con-artist Bobby Pope is running out of places to hide. His on-and-off girlfriend Lucy "The Nail" Naylor grudgingly takes him in, but when Detective Theodore Irvine and his corrupt cops track them down, the suburbs of Denver erupt into a war zone. Their only hope is to run, but Irvine isn't about to let them go that easily. Not everyone will escape the resulting high-speed chase unscathed!
ComicInfo.Title: Snapshots Part 2; Dead Man's Hand Part 3
